name: YASHE Food Dehydrator Machine, 9 Stainless Steel Food Dryer, 1000W Dehydrators for Food and Jerky, Herbs, Meat, Fruit, Dog Treats, 48H Timer and Temperature Control (95-165℉), Recipes Book Included
about_this_item: Efficient Drying Technology: The 1000W food dehydrator with dual rear fans and 360° hot air circulation ensures rapid and uniform drying of various foods, including meats, herbs, vegetables, and fruits
Customizable Settings: Features adjustable temperature control (95-165℉) in 5℉ increments and a 48-hour timer with 30-minute intervals, allowing for precise and personalized dehydration
Spacious and Quiet: Equipped with nine stainless steel trays for ample drying space and operates quietly at less than 48 dB, making it suitable for home use without causing disturbances
Durable and Safe Design: Made from food-grade BPA-free stainless steel with dishwasher-safe trays. It includes automatic shutdown and thermal protection to prevent overheating, ensuring user safety

User-Friendly Features: Includes an LED digital display for easy monitoring, a transparent door for viewing the dehydration process, and a comprehensive package with additional accessories such as 2 mesh sieves and a fruit roll tray for versatile use
